hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
rm -rf $WORKSPACE/* . /root/dp/func-master.sh && prepare_env cd /root/dp/testing/grinder
# MASTER prepeare ./start_console.sh
set +e while ! nc -vz localhost 6373; do sleep 1; done set -e
# CLIENT prepare ssh $CLIENT_HOST /bin/bash <<EOF . /root/dp/func-client.sh && prepare_env cd dp/testing/grinder rm -rf output rm -f ~/dp/stats/* cat /sys/devices/system/cpu/online start_monitoring ./start_agent.sh $TEST </dev/null EOF
# SERVER prepare ssh $SERVER_HOST /bin/bash <<EOF . /root/dp/func-server.sh && prepare_env dp/prepare-echo-server.sh </dev/null rm -f ~/dp/stats/* start_monitoring EOF
# START THE BENCHMARK, blocks curl -S -X POST localhost:6373/agents/start-workers sleep $DURATION curl -S -X POST localhost:6373/agents/stop
# AFTER BENCHMARK ./stop_console.sh
# SERVER stop ssh $SERVER_HOST /bin/bash <<EOF . /root/dp/func-server.sh && prepare_env dp/stop-echo-server.sh stop_monitoring EOF
# CLIENT stop ssh $CLIENT_HOST /bin/bash <<EOF . /root/dp/func-client.sh && prepare_env cd dp/testing/grinder stop_monitoring ./stop_agent.sh tail -n 100 output/${CLIENT_HOST}-0.log > output/result.log rm -f output/${CLIENT_HOST}-0.log zip -q output/data.zip output/${CLIENT_HOST}-0-data.log rm -f output/${CLIENT_HOST}-0-data.log EOF
cd $WORKSPACE # COLLECT OUTPUT scp $SERVER_HOST:dp/jboss-eap-6.3/standalone/log/server.log . scp $SERVER_HOST:dp/stats/* . scp $CLIENT_HOST:dp/stats/* . scp -r $CLIENT_HOST:dp/testing/grinder/output/* .
